item.title: Becky add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Try a little harder to be a little better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Becky add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Work at our responsibility as parents as if everything in life counted on it." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Becky add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Let us never forget to pray. God lives. He is near. He is real. He is not only aware of us but cares for us. He is our Father. He is accessible to all who will seek Him." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Becky add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Angry people are not always wise." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Becky add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "If we ever forget that we're one nation under God, then we will be one nation gone under." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Becky add a quote by Marjorie Pay Hinckley
item.description: "The only way to get through life is to laugh your way through it. You either have to laugh or cry. I prefer to laugh. Crying gives me a headache." -- Marjorie Pay Hinckley

item.title: Becky add a quote by Marjorie Pay Hinckley
item.description: "Be kind. Everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle." -- Marjorie Pay Hinckley

item.title: Becky add a quote by Marjorie Pay Hinckley
item.description: "I know it is hard for you young mothers to believe that almost before you can turn around the children will be gone and you will be alone with your husband. You had better be sure you are developing the kind of love and friendship that will be delightful and enduring. Let the children learn from your attitude that he is important. Encourage him. Be kind. It is a rough world, and he, like everyone else, is fighting to survive. Be cheerful. Don't be a whiner." -- Marjorie Pay Hinckley
